samples.context: A city was experiencing heavy rainfall over several days. The authorities realized that if there was excessive rain, reservoirs and dams would overflow. If reservoirs overflow, flooding occurs.
samples.question: There is heavy rainfall in Dallas. Does flooding occur?

samples.context: One morning, a student woke up late for an exam. They knew that if someone wakes up late, they have to rush to get ready. The student understood that if you arrive late for an exam, you have less time to complete it.
samples.question: Liam woke up late. Did Liam finish the exam?

samples.context: A musician started composing original songs. They thought that if they compose original songs, more people will notice their talent. If more people notice a musician's talent, they gain popularity.
samples.question: Alex composes original songs. Does Alex get offered a record deal?

samples.context: One day, a student decided to start studying more each day. They believed that if someone studies more daily, their knowledge grows. If knowledge grows, academic performance improves.
samples.question: Layla studies more each day. Does her academic performance improve?

samples.context: A new restaurant opened in town advertising fresh, organic ingredients. The owner believed that if a restaurant uses fresh, organic ingredients, the food tastes amazing. If the food tastes amazing, positive reviews spread on social media.
samples.question: The new restaurant uses fresh, organic ingredients. Did long lines form outside?

samples.context: A company decided to invest in the latest software tools and infrastructure. They believed that with updated tools, their team's productivity would improve. If productivity improves, more work can get done.
samples.question: Acme Co. invests in updated software tools. Does their profitability increase?

samples.context: A student wanted to do well in an important exam. They knew that if someone studies hard, they understand the material better. If a person understands the material well, they perform better on tests.
samples.question: John studied hard. Did John perform well on the exam?

samples.context: A farmer diligently cared for his crops this season. He believed that if you nurture plants properly, they will thrive. When crops thrive, harvests become more bountiful.
samples.question: Sam nurtures his crops properly this season. Will he have a bountiful harvest?

samples.context: The weather forecast predicted heavy rainfall for the upcoming weekend. The city knew that if there is heavy rain, the storm drains overflow. If storm drains overflow, streets flood.
samples.question: There is heavy rainfall. Do streets flood?

samples.context: One day, someone decided to start exercising regularly. They believed that if someone exercises regularly, they will gain more energy. If someone gains energy, they have improved moods.
samples.question: Did James become much happier after he started exercising regularly?

samples.context: A young man was looking to adopt a pet. He learned that if you adopt an animal, you have to commit to taking care of it. He knew that if you properly care for a pet, it will be happy and healthy.
samples.question: Kevin adopts a pet. Will it be happy and healthy?

samples.context: A gardener prepared their vegetable garden for the new season. They believed that if the soil has enough nutrients, the plants will be healthy. The gardener added compost and fertilizer to enrich the soil. The plants grew strong and produced lots of vegetables. If plants are healthy, they yield bigger harvests.
samples.question: The gardener enriched the soil. Was the harvest abundant?

samples.context: A salesperson wanted to exceed their monthly sales target. They focused on building strong relationships with customers. The salesperson believed that if someone builds good customer relationships, the customers will be loyal. If customers are loyal, sales numbers will be consistent.
samples.question: Mark built strong customer relationships. Were Mark's monthly sales consistently high?

samples.context: One day, a student decided to attend classes regularly. They believed that if a student attends classes regularly, they will understand the lectures better. If a student understands the lectures, they perform well on exams and assignments.
samples.question: Mary attends classes regularly. Does she pass the class with an excellent grade?

samples.context: A band worked hard to create good music. They believed that if musicians practice together often, their chemistry improves. If a band has good chemistry, their live performances are more engaging.
samples.question: The band practiced together often. Were the band's live shows engaging?
